name: Of Carrots And Blood (Classic Edition)
description:
"The day is coming when a single carrot, freshly observed, will set off a revolution."

(Paul Cezanne)


Of Carrots And Blood is a survival arena shooter about bunnies, carrots, mutants, blood and LOVE.

1 Player:

  • competitive global highscore
  • infinite fun
  • BECOME THE BEST!

2 Player Co-op:

  • Shoot
  • Revive your partner
  • KISS :D

Fight and survive the crazy waves of mutants, shadows and ogres which are trying to eat you and the giant carrot.

In Co-op mode there will be a satisfying surprise at the end :)

CONTROLS

(Xbox 360 controller highly recommended)

Keyboard:

  • W, A, S, D to move bunny
  • Move mouse to aim
  • Left mouse button to shoot

Keyboard (alternative):

  • W, A, S, D to move bunny
  • Up, Down, Left, Right keys to aim and shoot

Controller (Xbox 360):

  • Left stick to move
  • Right stick to aim and shoot
